EmailTemplate.name: Notifying Project Manager/Others On their Declining The Feedback Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: Decline Of Requested KRA Feedback Submission For {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PM_Configure__c.Reporting_Contact__c},
I hope this message finds you well. This is to inform you that your recent feedback request on {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c} for the {!PM_Configure__c.Project_Name__c} has been declined by you.
The reason submitted by you is provided below.
{!PM_Configure__c.Rejection_Cancellation_Reason__c}
Thank you for your cooperation.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
